svg.script: const test = async_test('getIntersectionList() on clipped element'); window.onload = test.step_func_done(() => { const testSVG = document.getElementById('root'); const r = testSVG.createSVGRect(); r.x = 0; r.y = 0; r.width = 100; r.height = 99.9; assert_equals(testSVG.getIntersectionList(r, testSVG).length, 1); });
